#DidYouKnow: In 2017, Black women earned only 61 cents for every dollar earned by white, non-Hispanic male workers. #PayBlackWomen
Due to the wage gap, Black women lose an about $946,120 over a 40-year career. https://www.americanprogress.org/issues/women/reports/2019/03/26/467778/rhetoric-vs-reality-making-real-progress-equal-pay/ …

Too many lives have been tragically lost, and the American people deserve action. That’s why I joined my colleagues in AGAIN calling for the Senate to reconvene and immediately pass bipartisan legislation that the House passed to help prevent gun violence. #DoSomething https://twitter.com/RepThompson/status/1159169224125890560 …

More than a fast network experience, this improved communication can literally save lives in North Carolina. I am pleased to see the launch of these new cell sites and applaud the work of @FirstNet Authority and @ATT are doing to meet public safety’s needs. #RuralBroadband pic.twitter.com/Je3isMDkuJ
How much longer should families in North Carolina have to wait to see the @SenateGOP finally #DoSomething to end gun violence? #EndGunViolenceNOW pic.twitter.com/6n2toj79IL

It’s been 160 days since I cast my vote for the Bipartisan Background Checks Act – and yet @SenateMajLdr McConnell has refused to bring this life-saving legislation to a vote ever since. #DoSomething pic.twitter.com/3m8YA05y3h

“We die. That may be the meaning of life. But we do language. That may be the measure of our lives.”-Toni Morrison. Though we mourn this loss, we marvel at a life lived and beautifully expressed in unapologetic truth as she saw it. #ThankYou #RIPToniMorrison pic.twitter.com/SaSC82GMPz
